Package org.corfudb.runtime.smr.legacy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractRuntime
    This is the interface exposed by CorfuDB to developers of new objects.
    IRemoteReadMap
    Created by crossbach on 5/22/15.
    IRPCClient
    Created by crossbach on 5/22/15.
    IRPCServer
    Created by crossbach on 5/22/15.
    IRPCServerHandler
    Created by crossbach on 5/22/15.
    Stream Deprecated
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseRuntime  
    CorfuDBObject
    This class must be sub-classed by any new CorfuDB object class.
    CorfuDBObjectCommand  
    DirectoryService
    This is a directory service that maps from human-readable names to CorfuDB object IDs.
    RemoteReadMap
    Created by crossbach on 5/22/15.
    SimpleRuntime
    This runtime implementation provides linearizable semantics for CorfuDB objects.
    SMREngine
    This class is an SMR engine.
    TLSCounter  
    TxDec  
    TxInt  
    TxIntReadSetEntry  
    TxIntWriteSetEntry  
    TXRuntime
    This class is a transactional runtime implementing the AbstractRuntime interface.
